subject: Amputation
Prostheses
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee from South Africa, qualified for next month’s world championships by running his best time in the 400 meters in his last race before the cutoff date.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee from South Africa, qualified for next month’s world championships by running his best time in the 400 meters in his last race before the cutoff date.
